title: Monkeybone: Show Me the Monkey
description: A comedy show based on Monkeybone, America’s most disturbed comic strip.
quote: What a loser! Roll out the wacky wagon!
creator: Stuart Miley
altHero: Monkeybone, a monkey in a vest, in front of a young boy
alt1: grown man sucking his thumb and looking at a moving stopwatch
alt2: teacher clapping blackboard erasers, her upper arms flapping in the air
alt4: psychiatrist laughing so hard he’s on the floor
